name: The Inner Dark Age
description:
Made for the MHGJ 2022

The goal of the jam was to create a therapeutic game in ~20 days. 

If you encounter a game breaking bug, you can press R to reset the level. You can also press Q to hide the mouse cursor.

Explore an isometric top down world as an owl with enemies lurking around every corner. Fight your fears, solve puzzles, relax and breathe all while trying to reach your ultimate goal. Will you succeed, or die trying?

How this is therapeutic:

There are healing stations and more where you get to relax and breathe to get rid of stress, while at the same time having fun while defeating your enemies. There are multiple places where you can just relax and breathe or solve puzzles to progress. A story is being told throughout the whole game, which might help people change their life for the better.
